title: Fujitsu
extract: Fujitsu Ltd.  is a Japanese multinational information technology equipment and services company headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. In 2015, it was the world's fourth-largest IT services provider measured by IT services revenue. Fortune named Fujitsu as one of the world's most admired companies and a Global 500 company.
extract_html: Fujitsu Ltd. is a Japanese multinational information technology equipment and services company headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. In 2015, it was the world's fourth-largest IT services provider measured by IT services revenue. Fortune named Fujitsu as one of the world's most admired companies and a Global 500 company.
